Strings.Text: Will you use the Resusc. Pak?
Not used to playing this type of game.
Used to playing this type of game.
Skilled in playing this type of game.
Equip and check your Main Weapon.
Equip and check your Sub Weapon.
Unable to carry any more items.
Set number of ammo to buy.
Due to radio wave interference, \nyou can't receive the map.
Your item space is full. \nYou can't buy.
There is no weapon to buy ammo \nor cartridge.

It shoots scatter 
shots.
Capable of shooting 
enemies both close 
range and wide range.

Has a very small 
recoil action. 
You can fire the 
weapon even while 
you're running.

The most destructive 
weapon. However the 
recoil action is too 
large to fire rapidly.

Destroys cells by 
way of vibration. 
Effective for a few 
seconds even after 
initial fire.

Launches wide range 
blazes. Effective on 
certain kinds of plants. 
Fire while you walk.

A light-weight weapon, 
held in both hands. 
Shoot even while 
running. However fire 
power is meager.

Rapid-fire and power 
are the features of 
this large-sized 
machine gun. 
Fire while you walk.

Fires 3 homing 
rockets at once. 
The most powerful 
weapon overall.

Penetrates through 
almost anything. 
The recoil is so 
tremendous you'll 
have to stop and fire.

Most powerful 
underwater weapon. 
Fires small torepedos. 
Capable of destroying 
hard materials.

Large knife, used to 
slash close range 
enemies and distance
yourself from them.

The gun puts out a 
high voltage shock, 
immobilizing the 
enemy.

It creates a wall of 
fire, enabling you to 
avert from frontal 
attacks.

Shoots a wave of 
shock immobilizing 
underwater enemies 
temporary.

Fires 5 mines into the 
ground blasting them 
instantaneouly and 
turns the enemy on 
it's back.

Machete with the 
heavy blade. It has 
increased cutting 
power.

The gun puts out a 
higher voltage shock, 
immobilizing the 
enemy.
Shoots a signal bullet \nsettig a target point \nto receive cover fire.
Stops the bleeding \nbut it will not \nrecover your health.
It will recover your \nhealth only by a little.
It will fully recover \nyour health but not \nstop the bleeding.
It will recover your \nhealth completely and \nstop the bleeding.
You can return to life \nwith your health fully \nrestored.
It will revitalize the \nhealth of the \ndinosaur.
Plug which is needed for the \noperation of the cooling \naqueduct shutters.
You need this keycard to enter \nEdward City from the lakeside.
You need this keycard to enter \nthe Research Facility. It's a \nshiny silverish keycard.
It will open the door to \nthe living quarters.
It can be used to unlock the \nelectronic lock in the Military \nFacility.
A battery used for starting \ninstruments and equipments.
The disk which has all the \n3rd Energy research data. \nThis mission's target.
Underwater gear made of metal. \nIt's equipped with jet propulsion \nwhich enables you to jump.
It was brought from the Military \nFacility when nerve gas was used \nto battle the dinosaurs.
Shoots a signal bullet setting \na target point to receive \ncover fire.
A card which verifies that you \nare a 3rd Energy Facility \nmechanic.
Appears to be a small key for a \ncompartment box.
A key needed to get into the \n3rd Energy Facility.
By wearing the armor, \nit will reduce the damage you \nreceive by a half.
By wearing the suit, it will \ncompletely stop you from \nbleeding.
It will extend the time that \nCOMBO is being displayed on the \nscreen.
It automatically doubles the points \nyou earn.
An alloy blade which will increase \nthe power of Dylan's machete.
A battery which will increase \nthe power of Regina's stungun.
It will allow you to buy weapons \nwith unlimited ammo.
Please do not remove \nthe Memory Card.
There is no Memory Card. \nPlease insert Memory Card and \npress button.
Memory Card Full. \nNo Blocks Open To Save.

New Memory Card has been 
Inserted. 
Press Button To Check 
Memory Card.
Sorry This Data Has Been \nUpdated To A Higher Version. \nUnable To Use Data.

If you start game now, 
you will not be able to 
Save Data. 
Are you sure you want to 
start game?

For optimal picture settings, 
adjust the brightness of your 
screen so that the color bar 
below the white line can't 
be seen.
Will you use the Resusc. Pak?
\nIt's electronically locked. {clear}You may be able to short it \nwith Regina's stungun.
The ivy is wrapped around the door. {clear}You may be able to cut it \nwith Dylan's machete.
\nThe door is locked on this version.
You got an EPS Platinum Card.\nYou wil be able to buy weapons \nwith unlimited ammo.
A bonus game, \nDINO COLOSSEUM has been added.
Shoot the enemies with the \nmachine gun.Z
Surpress the Triceratops' attack \nusing the rifle.Z
An intelligence agent of S.O.R.T. \nShe is calm and rational. \nShe excels in infiltration.
A Special Forces TRAT member. \nA soldier with a tragic fate.
An intelligence agent of S.O.R.T. \nA hi-tech specialist.
An intelligence agent of S.O.R.T. \nA man with a heart made of \nstone.
An escort tank used for \nprotection when transporting \nvaluable recsources.
A quick and tricky carnivorous \ndino. Attacks its enemy with its \nkick and poison spit.
A speedy hunter of the jungle. \nIt has many ways to attack its \nprey.
A four legged reptile with rock \nhard jaws and armor like skin. \nIts armor will withstand even fire.
A cold blooded beast with size \nand agility to its advantage. \nIts footwork will corner its prey.
Undisputed king of the jungle. \nRanks first in the heirarchy of \nthe food chain.
Ususally a tame herbivorous \ndinosaur. Its running charge will \ndestroy everything in its way.
Absolutely the weakest of the \ndinos. When in a jam, it may \ncall his friends for help.
Start a new game from the beginning.
Start from a place last saved.
Annihilate all the dinosaurs \nwithin the time limit.
It's dinosaur versus dinosaur. \n(2 player game)

This file contains a few 
pointers which may help you 
in the beginning of your 
mission especially when you 
become lost or stuck. 
 
 TRAT Headquarters {clear}Extinction Points 
When you kill your enemy 
you will earn points called 
{0x0008}Extinction Points{0x0009}. 
On this mission you will buy 
ammo, weapons, health 
recoveries, and other items 
using these {0x0008}Extinction 
Points{0x0009}. {clear}It is important for a smooth 
and successful mission that 
Extinction Points be earned 
efficiently. However, 
Extinction Points won't do you 
any good unless you use 
them. We recommend 
equipping yourselves with 
the most powerful weapon 
whenever possible. {clear}Combo 
When you kill an enemy, 
points earned will be 
displayed on the screen. 
If you succeed in killing 
additional enemies while the 
points are being displayed 
your credit increase rate will 
go up. This is called a 
combo. This is an important {clear}technique you should learn 
to use. {clear}Combat Technique 
By pressing the R button 
you can move about in 
a firing stance. You can 
even change from target to 
target by pressing the 
L button while holding 
down the R button. {clear}Equipment 
The following items will be 
shared by everyone on the 
team. Health recovery items, 
key items, Extintion Points, 
Main and Sub Weapons with 
an exception of a few. {clear}During your mission, you may 
come across instances where 
you cannot carry any more 
health recovery items. 
In these situations you 
should use the unnecessary 
recovery items which will 
make space, allowing you to 
carry another item.

Again the day has come... 
Jan. 14th. This is the day 
when the 3rd Energy 
accident occurred and we 
were sent to this time. 
This is the 10th time this day 
has come.
And everytime I feel the 
same, despair...{clear}The medical supplies from 
the Med. room has all been 
used up in the very first
year. Since then we've been 
collecting wild plants to make 
medicine without knowing its 
effect. Nevertheless, they 
were used in healing the 
wounds of the soldiers. 
And all we could do was to {clear}wait for the rescue.{clear}Why haven't they come to 
rescue us? I've thought 
about the question for 
the past ten years and 
I have come to a conclusion. 
The Time shift or fold 
is caused by the {0x0008}Overdrive{0x0009} 
of the 3rd Energy. But our 
current technology level 
wasn't high enough to {clear}recover the {0x0008}accident{0x0009}. 
Years of technology research 
still would not be enough.{clear}A time error of 10 or 20 
years is insignificant to 
a time slip of 65 million 
years. But that error, 
that time difference could 
mean everything for us. 
We should have never laid 
our hands on a toy so 
dangerous.

This is a notification that 
now all facility keys will be 
managed in this control room. 
The colors of the lock 
terminal corresponds to 
the colors of the key. 
Matching the colors of the 
keys and the terminals will 
release the security lock.{clear}Due to security reasons, 
only one key can be removed 
at a time. Also, the keys' 
electronic information is 
reprogrammed each week. 
For this reason always 
return the key to the 
Key Control System after 
use.

All instruments and 
materials will be tranferred 
to the research facility 
tomorrow. Starting next 
month, an extensive 
experiment will start relating 
to the Timegate. There just 
aren't enough computers to 
save all the data. {clear}We need as many computers 
as we can gather.{clear}The Timegate's Revival 
Project has hit against a 
wall. We hope the 
experiment will bring about 
effective measures. 
Give all Research Facility 
Keys to Lieutenant Wolf 
of the Transport team 
today.{clear}The key cards are kept in a 
box in the wall of this room. 
Approximately 250 people of 
the soldiers' families have 
been moved to the living 
quarters of Edward City 
last month. 
Now it's all up to us to 
revive the Timegate.

{clear}From recent reports it 
appears that in parts of the 
jungle near the facility 
there has been a sudden 
outbreak of poisonous plants 
called {0x0008}pp-34{0x0009}. From the 
body approximately 80 cm in 
diameter, they continue to 
spout poisonous spores. 
One of our members who {clear}inhaled the spores is in a 
unconscious critical state.{clear}For those of you who are 
on the medicine plant sample 
collecting team, temporary 
stop the sample collecting 
and set up a team to rid of 
the poisonous plants. 
Use Flame Launchers 
for this emergency operation.{clear}When doing so, remember to 
keep your distance from 
the target.

March 25th 
Lately many of our guys have 
reported missing belongings. 
Especially smaller items such 
as hand mirrors and watches. 
Just the other day, my 
silver rocket followed the 
same fate. There are rumors 
that it's the handy work 
of a tiny dinosaur. It's got {clear}a real jivy name like {0x0008}Compy{0x0009} 
or something.{clear} 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 {clear}April 3rd 
Today I heard an interesting 
story. Crows and other birds 
have a peculiar behavior of 
collecting shiny things. 
It appears as though these 
Compys may have similar 
behaviors. Come to think of 
it all of the missing items 
were all shiny things.{clear}They seem to have a lot of 
similarities with the birds. 
It could be that they are 
their ancestors. We haven't 
been able to capture any of 
them since they are so quick 
on their feet. But if we use 
their behavior to our 
advantage, then maybe...{clear}April 6th 
We used the cage used for 
laboratory animals and we 
were finally able to capture 
one of them. We used 
Alan's bracelet as a bait and 
cornered him in. The key to 
capturing is to block 
all possible escape routes. 
If there is even a small {clear}escape route they will not 
enter the cage.{clear}Our plan is to use this cage 
to get rid of them as fast 
as we can. The Raptors who 
eat them for snacks have 
started to roam around this 
area. Compys... 
what a nuisance.{clear}There is still two more 
weeks until the general 
research staff can move 
into Edward City. 
Until then we have to do our 
best to protect this facililty 
from the dinosaurs.

The recovery of the Timegate 
seems impossible with the 
limited instrumentations we 
have in this world. 
Today was supposed to have 
been the last hopeful 
experiment. However, 
the lack of instruments 
stopped us from conducting 
this experiment.{clear}One week ago, the Transport 
team lead by Lieutenant Wolf 
was supposed to bring 
us the instruments for the 
experiment. They never 
arrived. Something must 
have happened in the Military 
Facility. We still haven't 
been able to establish 
communication with them.{clear}If we still intend to pursue 
with the experiment we need 
to go to the Missile Silo 
on the other side of the 
suspension bridge. But the 
bridge was destroyed in a 
recent combat. The only 
other way to the other side 
is through the deadly poison 
zone. {clear}It is too dangerous to 
even go near the area.{clear}

Another dead body of a 
youth was carried in. As 
expected he was not a 
resident of Edward City. 
If this is really true then the 
only possible conclusion is 
that he and the others must 
have come from another time. 
Could such a thing be 
possible?{clear}These past months youths 
about the age of 17 or 18 
have shown up before us 
and attacked. 

Communication with these 
youths have not been 
successful, but rather 
impossible.{clear} 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 {clear}Today we plan to remove one 
of the bodies out of the 
preservation liquid and 
conduct an autopsy. 
The result of the autopsy 
will be reported to 
Colonel Maison who is 
dispatched at the 
3rd Energy Facility.

I knew it would all come to 
this. There's no way humans 
and dinosaur could ever 
coexist. 
But if we sacrifice our 
lives now, we would leave 
a chance for the existance 
of the human race.{clear}The irony is that this whole 
facility which we are trapped 
in was built to sustain a 
suitable enviroment for the 
dinosaurs. 
 
I am the superintendent of 
the facility and I'm the only 
one left. I don't belong here.{clear}There is no future for this 
world. The children hurt by 
the dinosaurs have been put 
inside life-support chambers. 
I trust that the people of the 
{0x0008}past{0x0009} will take care of them. 
The life-support chambers are 
almighty. It should be able 
to heal any wound, no matter 
how critical they may be.{clear}Also the life-support 
chambers will feed 
knowledge and teach them 
about this world. However, 
the chambers were originally 
designed for the growth of 
dinosaurs. Thus the 
knowledge fed will be limited 
to the knowledge of 
coexisting with the dinosaurs.{clear}The tradegy is that the 
children will eventually lose 
their speaking ability. But 
instead they will have been 
inputted the instincts to 
protect the dinosaurs. {clear}Today I have recorded my 
message for the man who 
will definitely come here. 
With this I have nothing 
to regret.

Year 2009 
It all began in Bolzinia, a 
small republic in the southern 
sea. The first {0x0008}Overdrive{0x0009} 
was the beginning of 
everything. {clear}During transportation 
something went wrong and it 
resulted in a crack in the 
spacetime which skewed 
history after the 
Cretaceous Era.{clear}To investigate the skewed 
biological history after the 
Cretaceous, an extensive 
experiment was conducted 
in a global scale. 
The result... devastating.{clear}The {0x0008}Spacetime skew{0x0009} would 
take its effect on all living 
organisms. The Earth's 
history would change 
dramatically and the change 
would wipe the human race 
from ever exisiting. 
That was the conclusion of 
the experiment.{clear}The plan was to transport the 
living organisms of the 
Cretaceous through the 
Timegate to a world with 
similar environments, 
far into the future. 
After the crisis had passed, 
the organisms would then be 
returned to their original time. {clear}We called this the Noah's 
Ark Plan.{clear}This was the only plan that 
would leave any chance for 
the existance of the human 
race. 
We hope that this plan is 
successful and we shall 
declare execution of this 
plan. 
 WAPP Central Council

It looks like this is the end 
for us. 
After surviving all this time... 
and to be killed by humans. 
Who are they? 
Those people with the 
full-face helmets and the 
rider suits.{clear}Somehow I managed to 
escape. 
But I seem to have dropped 
the key for this facility. 
How foolish of me. 
I can only think of one 
place where it might be. 
I must have dropped it 
somewhere near the spring 
in the jungle.{clear} 
 
 
 
 
 
 {clear}That spring has rather a fast 
current considering its small 
size. I must go there 
quickly or else it may drift 
away somewhere. 
The disk I was to deliver 
Colonel Maison has been 
stolen by them helmets. 
I believe the the data was 
about some kind of autopsy.

The security code for the 
elevator to the underwater 
3rd Energy Reactor 
has been changed. 
The new code # is §§§§.

June 2nd, 10:30PM 
Tomorrow afternoon two 
mechanics are coming to this 
facility from Edward City. 
It is time for the annual 
maintenance check of 
the 3rd Energy Reactor. 
This will be the 9th time.{clear}The instant something 
happens to the underwater 
reactor, that is when all 
life-lines will be cut off 
to us. Again, all we can do 
is to pray that nothing 
will happen. As weird as it 
may sound, sometimes I feel 
that it'll do us all a favor 
if that reactor just {clear}blew up on us .{clear}June 3rd, 4:00PM 
The mechanics who went to 
the underwater 3rd Energy 
Reactor still have not 
returned. They probably 
became their lunch. This is 
a problem. One of the 
mechanics, Bob, has the key 
to the entrance of 
Edward City.{clear}To go from this facility to 
the city, it is critical that 
we get back the key. 
I guess there is no real 
choice but to get in the 
diving suit and go down 
myself. I just hope I don't 
become their dinner.

To Bob, 
I heard that you were placed 
in charge of this area. 
As a present for your new 
position, here is a memo 
which may come in handy. 
It's about restarting the 
power.{clear}When you try to initialize the 
power restarting program, it 
often stops right? Well it's 
due to the malfunctioning of 
the three control terminals. 
Here are some tips to 
operate it.{clear}When you initialize the 
program, it quickly overloads 
and the lamp turns red, right? 
Well, when that happens all 
you need to do is just give 
it some electric shock with 
some kind of tool. 
It should wake the sucker up. 
Anyway good luck. See ya. 
 Mike

As always, we'll conduct the 
preventative maintenance by 
assigning labor tasks. 
Bob will be in charge of 
the 3rd Energy Reactor 
itself. Alec will be in 
charge of checking the 
Water Circulation System.{clear}As in previous years for the 
safety of the mechanics, 
during maintenance work 
make sure to close the 
shutters for the cooling 
aqueducts. Alec will unplug 
the plug which allows 
control of the shutter and 
keep it until Bob is done 
checking the reactor.{clear}The other day there was an 
explosion in the water 
circulation chamber. 
This explosion caused a crack 
in one of the concrete 
columns. One more explosion 
would have probably 
destroyed it. Remember to 
repair that as well.

---the four legged creature--- 
bullet proof armor... 
turn it over on it's back and 
aim for the stomach... 
weapon capable of doing 
that is the chain...

I underestimated the idea of 
trying to protect human 
territory. The plan to clean 
out the dinosaurs intruding 
into the city failed. 
The humans in this world are 
about to be extinct.{clear}We human should have never 
laid our hands on 3rd Energy. 
The military folks still don't 
get it even after all this. 
Their plan is to fire the 
3rd Energy Missile in this 
area of the jungle and wipe 
the whole area out.{clear}They plan to take the 
3rd Energy data disk to the 
Missile silo in the Jungle and 
input the data in the warhead. 
The missile is scheduled to 
strike this area at noon 
tomorrow. It's either the 
missile first or us first...
who knows?

{clear} 
Meaning: 
 Swift Seizer 
 
Length: 
 4.8 meters 
 
Height: 
 1.8 meters
 
 {clear}Observation Records 
We originally thought of 
dinosaurs were just 
{0x0008}slow and dumb reptiles{0x0009}. 
We soon realized this wasn't 
true at all. 
The Velociraptor proved us 
all wrong.{clear}The claws on each foot is 
sharp as a blade, providing 
for a powerful slash making 
them a killing machine. 
The long hard tail is used as 
a balance when running in 
high speeds. However, it is 
also used as a weapon. 
Their tail whip is so powerful 
that it can shatter bones.{clear}Combat notes 
When and if you encounter 
them, never show your back 
to them. The moment you 
start running away you 
become prey a to them. 
No soldier has come back 
alive running away from 
them. The basic rule in 
this world is to fight.{clear}The raptors are the most 
prosperous carnivorous 
dinosaurs in this world. 
There live different flocks 
in various areas. 
Their behavior and endurance 
are not all similar but 
they all have one thing 
in common. Speed. 
They are fast. {clear}It is best not to use 
heavy weapons. {clear}Also on very rare occasions, 
there have been encounters 
of blue raptors reported. 
Their attack and toughness 
are said to be {0x0008}Ultra-Raptor{0x0009} 
level. 
Go hunt them down if you 
dare to claim yourself as a 
{0x0008}real{0x0009} hunter.

{clear} 
Meaning: 
 Winged and Toothless 
 
Length: 
 3.0 meters 
 
Wingspan: 
 6.0 meters 
 {clear}Observation Records 
They mostly feed on fish. 
These flying reptiles are 
typlically found near 
lakesides. 
They hover and glide over 
the water searching for fish 
then with tremendous speed 
they dive to snatch their 
prey.{clear}Although, their diet consist 
of mainly fish, they also 
feed on small animals and 
even on mammals like us 
humans. 
Lately, the Pteranodons have 
started to attack on humans 
near the facility trying to 
fight for their territory.{clear}Combat notes 
When they are circling 
above you, it is very hard 
to shoot them. 
Although they seem to be 
flying slowly, but in fact are 
flying fairly fast. 
Before they attack their prey, 
they'll come and surround 
you. {clear}That's when you should 
shoot them down.{clear}One thing you have to 
remember is that their skin 
of armor is thicker than it 
appears and if you are too 
busy trying to shoot one 
down, the others will attack 
you off guard. To lessen the 
chance of this happening 
it is important to choose 
an appropriate weapon.

{clear} 
Meaning: 
 Egg Robber 
 
Length: 
 2.5 meters 
 
Height: 
 1.3 meters 
 
 {clear}Observation Records 
Ever since coming to this 
world, we've encountered 
many different dinosaurs. 
But this is the first one we 
thought we could handle 
easily. But we soon learned 
that we were sadly mistaken. 
They are equipped with two 
arsenals. {clear}One is their sharp 
beak and the other is their 
poison.{clear}The name {0x0008}Egg Robber{0x0009} was 
originally given based on 
misconception. But it turns 
out that they use their beaks 
to crack the hard shells of 
eggs and to protect 
themselves they have 
acidic poison. 
They are well equipped in 
both offense and defense.{clear}Combat notes 
You shouldn't stop moving 
when you fight them. 
Some will spit poison, 
some will jump kick you. 
You will have a better 
chance surviving if you 
continue to move around 
and attack.{clear}Their small size makes them 
a pain. They scamper and 
attack in groups. They really 
gets on your nerves. 
To counter them, a weapon 
which you can blaze away. 
It should do the job.

{clear} 
Meaning: 
 Odd Lizard 
 
Length: 
 8.5 meters 
 
Height: 
 3.0 meters
 
 {clear}Observation Record 
Anyone who encounters this 
dinosaur will first feel 
threatened. Although they're 
over 8 meters in height, 
they can easily jump over 
obstructions which are 
2 meters high. They will 
not let a prey escape 
from them. {clear}Their prey is not limited to 
herbivores. They also feed 
on small carnivores. You 
should look out for the 
Allosaurus in areas where 
raptors are present. There 
have been sightings of the 
Allosaurus hunting in groups. 
We figure there are quite 
a number of them.{clear}Combat notes 
They always position 
themselves to face their 
enemy. This is probably 
because they have a real 
hard armor on their head. 
Shooting their head will 
not really hurt them.{clear}A smart way of killing it 
is to go around to their 
side and shooting them in 
the side of their stomach.
However, their quick feet 
makes it difficult to move 
to their side. If this 
technique is difficult, 
you'll have to rely on a 
weapon with fire power.

{clear} 
Meaning: 
 Three Horned Face 
 
Length: 
 8.5 meters 
 
Height: 
 3.0 meters 
 
 {clear}Observation Record 
They are herbivores and they 
can be found in the outskirts 
of the city in the fields. 
They protect the herd's eggs 
in herds. They are social 
dinosaurs. {clear}They are very gentle in 
nature and they will not 
become vicious unless 
forced to. Such as stepping 
on their eggs.{clear}A half a year ago their attack 
on the city was unstoppable. 
A section of the city was 
completely destroyed. 
They seem to remember who 
harmed them. Ever since 
then, some of our soldiers 
had to pay their lives for it.{clear}Combat Notes 
If you dare fight them you 
have already lost the fight. 
An angry Triceratop is 
unstoppable. The only thing 
that will stop it is an even 
more angry Triceratops.{clear}All we can do against them 
is to use heavy firearms 
and aim for their nose and 
get as far away as possible. 
Since they have priority for 
their social lives, they will 
not come after you if you 
leave their territory. 
All you can do is run.

{clear} 
Meaning: 
 Near Lizard 
 
Length: 
 17.0 meters 
 
Height: 
 3.0 meters 
 
 {clear}Observation Record 
Our life-line, the 3rd Energy 
Reactor is located in the 
lake, underwater. 
Half of the mechanics who 
go under for preventative 
maintenance never come back. 
They probably become bait 
for that giant thing.{clear}They are carnivorous reptiles. 
With their long neck they 
surface the head to breathe. 
It's been reported that they 
have been seen attacking the 
Pteranodons from the water 
with their long agile necks.{clear}When attacked by them, aim 
for their head. They'll try 
to pull their prey into the 
water using their long necks. 
When you are attacked, the 
best thing you can do is to 
fire back at them.{clear}When you encounter them in 
the water, unfortunately the 
only thing that will really 
hurt them is explosive 
artillary. You also have to 
be careful of the strong 
water current they produce 
when they swim. 
It may be wise to avoid 
fighting them in the water.

{clear} 
Meaning: 
 Tyrant Lizard King 
 
Length: 
 14.5 meters 
 
Height: 
 4.8 meters 
 
 {clear}Observation Record 
As the name states it well, 
they are the largest land 
carnivores of this Cretaceous 
world. They act upon their 
hunter instinct and are 
always on the hunt for prey 
in order to sustain energy 
for their gigantic body.{clear}What is so special about 
them is their implacability. 
Once they set their eyes on 
its prey, they have a habit of 
pursuing it. A soldier 
once reported that he saw 
one swimming trying to follow 
its prey. {clear}Not to mention their 
savageness. 

After making a toy of their 
prey, they will finish it 
with a lethal bite.{clear}Combat Notes 
No reports have come in with 
regards to killing a T-Rex. 
Every soldier who tried to 
kill it have died. There are 
hardly any combat data. 
If we were forced to give an 
indirect conclusion, we would 
say that the T-Rex has no 
real weakness.{clear}Rumor has it that there was 
one person who escaped 
from the implacable T-Rex 
chase. She was not a soldier 
but simply an Intelligence 
Personnel. Supposedly, good 
looking about 20 years old.

{clear} 
Meaning: 
 River of Mosa Lizard 
 
Length: 
 6.0 meters 
 
Height: 
 0.8 meters 
 
 {clear}Observation Record 
Their main diet seems to 
be the ammonites which live 
in the bottom of the waters. 
During breeding season many 
Mosasaurus gather near the 
facility in search of food.{clear}The jaws which are strong 
enough to crush even the 
hardest shells are without a 
doubt, a threat to us humans. 
Even the hardest diver suit 
will not stand up to a 
mosasaurus' bite.{clear}Despite their large size, 
they are able to swim 
quickly. Their mobilty is 
extraordinary.{clear}Combat Notes 
The first thing to do is 
stopping them. 
Shooting NEEDLES is one way. 
But the most effective way 
is to blast them with the 
SHOCKWAVE and knock them 
out. {clear}SHOCKWAVING them is 
especially useful when there 
are multiple enemies.{clear}They like to hide in small 
places. 
So you should be cautious 
near walls where there are 
holes and openings.

{clear} 
Meaning: 
 Giant Lizard 
 
Length: 
 Over 20 meters 
 
Height: 
 Over 7 meters 
 
 {clear}Observation Record 
{0x0008}There exists a dinosaur 
much larger than the T-Rex...{0x0009} 
such a rumor spread among 
the soldiers. 
The search for {0x0008}it{0x0009} began 
3 years ago. There have 
been no sightings.{clear}However, last summer deep 
in the jungle, a dead T-Rex 
was found with huge teeth 
marks on its throat. 
The rumor was not going to 
end just as a rumor. 
Not for a while. {clear}Combat Notes 
There is nothing known 
about their attacking 
behaviors. 
This can mean two things. 
One is that no such dinosaur 
exists. Two is that every 
soldier who did encounter it 
have disappeared without a 
trace.{clear}Soldiers who strayed away 
from the troop, approximately 
70% of their bodies have not 
been found. 
Judging from this, we cannot 
ingnore the fact that there 
just may be a gigantic 
dinosaur who have swallowed 
our men whole. {clear}Anyone who has seen the 
giant never lives to tell about 
it.

{clear} 
Length: 
 3.7 meters 
 
Height: 
 1.2 meters 
 
 {clear}Observation Records 
The cave route which leads 
to the city, passes through 
a volcano. Two years ago, 
the volcano suddenly started 
acting up. From about that 
same time the four-legged 
creature began appearing. 
They seem to favor hot 
and dark places.{clear}We believed that these 
four-legged creatures were 
herbivores due to the 
scarcity of living organisms 
in their habitat. 
But when one our men was 
attacked by one of them, 
we learned that they were 
actually omnivores. {clear}Although they are slow, 
we have to find ways to 
counter them.{clear}Combat Record 
We still have yet to find 
a way to fight them. 
It's their ultra-hard armor 
which they wear that makes 
them so tough. No regular 
firearm will hurt them. Their 
jaws are also very strong. 
Strong enough to even crush 
a helmet.{clear}The only effective way we 
know so far is, when they 
attack they stand on their 
hind legs. 
This is when you should 
shoot their stomach. 
It seems to be their 
weakpoint. {clear}Currently a prototype weapon 
is in the late stages of 
development. 
This mine like weapon when 
complete should flip them on 
their backs. But we don't 
know for sure if it will 
really work.

{clear} 
Meaning: 
 Pretty Jaws 
 
Length: 
 1.2 meters 
 
Height: 
 0.5 meters 
 
 {clear}Commonly known as Compy. 
Their diet consists of mainly 
insects. They are tiny 
dinosaurs. They are typically 
no threat to humans. 
They move in packs and their 
social life revolves around 
their pack.{clear}It's when they started 
nesting in our research 
facility, is when they became 
a nuisance. 

Their eyes appears to be 
similar to that of the birds. {clear}We speculate that 
when they detect small shiny 
metallic things, it is their 
behavior to take it back to 
their nest. 
This behavior has frquently 
caused problems inside 
our facility.{clear}Combat Notes 
No real notes has been taken 
since they do not directly 
inflict harm to humans. 
However, we are thinking of 
ways to stop them from 
stealing small belongings 
from the soldiers.
